reviews.review: Best single-palyer storytale shooter since Half-Life 2
What a great third installment! After Bioshock 1 & 2 I got a bit tired of it, but this has totally solved it and that ending...

This one is sadly timely.  Play and hope for a better tomorrow.

Excelent!

AFAIK,  This version of Bioshock is the most complete and all DLC is currently listed on steam.  After a game has been available for several years,  it should be updated to the latest and most complete version of the game. And that is what they have done for BioShock Infinite, it is complete.  get it, play it, & enjoy.
La historia es buenisima y las mecanicas del juego lo hacen aun mejor!!!
Mecanicamente perfeito, histÃ³ria maravilhosa. Vale muito a pena!
A masterpiece of a game. The DLC add to the story behind Bioshock, but the main story... I can't understand how I didn't play it before.
One of the best games I have ever played.

overall it's a fun game and interesting plot. howerver there are still lots of things i did not expect or should i say did not meet my expectations. for examples, i rushed the game not knowing how to change or modify gears or vigor powers without any problem because of most of the time, i rely more on guns rather than anything else. the combat is a bit sluggish and sometimes i get stuck at small edges of small objects i did not see while moving etc. but even so, i am willing to put that aside because of the story. not perfect but interesting.

Few games really make you sit back and process when the credits roll. This is one of those. The worldbuilding and aesthetic just add to the story, which feels both long as shit and as short as five minutes. If you love vintage/retro things, or steampunk or whatever, you'll enjoy this game.
Its intriguing story ties you up from the beginning: the references to the other BioShock games, the actions, the characters. Everything is perfect
yea it's pretty good bc we get to play it at school!!
Pedazo de juego me explota la cabeza cuando lo juego.
el juego es divertido pero sobre todo tiene una buena historia
I very warmly recommend this game. The gameplay is smooth; the story, universe and characters are incredibly well-written. A true masterpiece.
